content:
# Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position 0.0, 0.0)
  
### Furnace at position (2.0, 0.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position 2.0, 0.0)

### Furnace at position (2.0, 2.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position 2.0, 2.0)

### Electricity generator at position (x)
Consists of:
- Steam engine (position x)
- Boiler (position y)
- Offshore pump (position z)

### Copper plate mine at position (x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace at position (y1)
- Burner mining drill (position x2) and a furnace at position (y2)
- Burner mining drill (position x3) and a furnace at position (y3)

### Copper cable factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace at position (y1)
- Assembling machine at position (z1) and inserter at position (a) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position) that connects the furnace at position y1 to assembling machine at position (z1)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to insufficient ingredients
- Ensure that all required ingredients are available before attempting to operate any machines. Check the inventory and gather necessary resources.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it. Check for existing entities in the target area.

### Errors related to crafting limits
- Monitor the number of craftable items in your inventory. If you cannot craft an item, check if you have the necessary components and if your crafting machines are operational.
